There is absolutely undeniable scientific proof that vaccines cause autism. There is no question! Case closed! Game over!

The people and the mainstream media  who claim that the vaccine autism link has been thoroughly debunked are all bought and paid for by the vaccine industry. They are lying and being paid to do it! And anyone who speaks against them gets royally defamed and defaced by the vaccine industry controlled media.

Andrew Wakefield’s colleague who co-authored the MMR study that linked the MMR vaccine to autism,  has been exonerated and his studies have been confirmed. 

“Justice Mitting, reviewing Dr. Walker-Smith’s appeal in the High Court of Justice, Queen’s Bench Division, Administrative Court, found that the GMC’s conclusions were “based on inadequate and superficial reasoning” and that “the finding of serious professional misconduct and the sanction of erasure are both quashed.” See full text of the decision.

Dr. Walker-Smith’s professional insurance coverage paid for his appeal; Dr. Wakefield’s insurance carrier would not.

Dr. Wakefield has recently filed a defamation lawsuit in Texas against the British Medical Journal, Dr. Fiona Godlee, Editor-in-Chief, and journalist Brian Deer, who instigated the GMC prosecution. His lawsuit alleges that the defendants knowingly or recklessly engaged in fraudulent misrepresentations about 1998 Lancet study. While far from decisive, the Mitting ruling bodes well for Dr. Wakefield’s defamation action.” Read more here

Aluminum: Scientific Support Proving it Causes Brain Damage and Destroys the Immune System

April 10, 2015May 3, 2015Anti-Vaccine Scientific Support Arsenal4 Comments

Aluminum is in almost all vaccines except the flu vaccine. It is a neuro-toxin! There is a lot of misinformation about aluminum and whether or not it is harmful when injected into the body. Aluminum is found in our soil and food now, but just because it is common in our environment doesn’t mean that we should just accept that it is healthy and good for us. The truth is that It is not good for us. It damages our cells and is toxic to all life forms. 
 When aluminum in our food is ingested we only absorb about 2% of it and the rest is excreted through the kidneys. But when aluminum is injected into the muscle, as it is in vaccinations, 100% of it is absorbed into the body! It passes the blood brain barrier and causes neurological damage. This can be manifested as ADHD, learning disabilities, mood disorders, and autism, and can affect the entire health of the body. 

Aluminum is a neuro-toxin and is not a necessary essential element. The reason that aluminum is used to induce an immune response is because it is a toxin! It shocks the immune system into hyper mode and make it overly sensitive to everything, which is why allergies can form.
 People will dispute this saying that certain kinds of aluminum are safe in small amounts. The forms of aluminum found in vaccines are aluminum hydroxide, aluminum sulfate,  and aluminum phosphate, and aluminum hydroxyphosphate. I looked these chemicals up on the New Jersey Department of Health Hazardous substance fact sheet Search page.

For starters here is the fact sheet on Aluminum Phosphate


 

As you can see aluminum phosphate is used in pharmueticals and its on the special health hazard substance list!

In the First Aid section above it says:

FIRST AID

Eye Contact

“Immediately flush with large amounts of cool water.
Continue for at least 15 minutes, occasionally lifting upper
and lower lids. Remove contact lenses, if worn, while
rinsing. Immediate medical attention is necessary. 


Skin Contact 

Quickly remove contaminated clothing. Immediately wash
contaminated skin with large amounts of soap and water. 

Inhalation 

Remove the person from exposure.
Begin rescue breathing (using universal precautions) if breathing has stopped and CPR if heart action has stopped.
Transfer promptly to a medical facility”


This is in vaccines! This is what is being injected into children’s muscles and bloodstreams, and it goes to their brains!

 

Educate yourself! There is a list of articles, videos, and websites below that will explain more about what aluminum is and what it does in the body. 

 Learn more in this interview by Dr. Suzanne Humphries. She explains what aluminum does in the brain and how it damages brain cells. Aluminum is toxic to all life forms. The Case Against Aluminum 

 Adjuvants affect the brain; Aluminum is falsely assumed to be safe

Top 6 Vaccine Truth Websites with Scientific Support

April 9, 2015May 3, 2015Anti-Vaccine Scientific Support Arsenal11 Comments

“Our judgement is no better than the quality of our information” – Steven Jacobson
When it comes to learning the truth about vaccines it can be hard to navigate the internet and actually find factual information, especially since it is such a controversial subject. There are plenty of websites on both sides of the issue. It can be confusing especially if you are still unsure of where you stand. 

 I will write about medical industry corruption and lies, mass media deception, and propaganda in another article. But it is important to understand how the medical mafia works and who is controlling the information that you hear on the news.  “For concerned parents seeking the truth, it’s worth remembering that the exact same people who own the world’s drug companies also own America’s news outlets. Finding propaganda-free information has been difficult, until now.” (Whiteoutpress.com)

 

Ask yourself: Do I believe this because it is the truth and I have researched it myself, or do I believe it because it’s what I’ve been told to believe? 

 Now there are many alternative news and vaccine information websites that are independent and propaganda free. So when the news media that is controlled by the vaccine industry is telling parents not to go to these websites because the doctors are “quacks” and it is not real science, that should be a big red flag! Those are the websites you should go to! The controlled mainstream media is trying to hide the truth and everyone deserves to know the truth! The real eye opener comes when you actually do go to one of those “quack” websites and start reading the science they present with an open mind. It starts to make so much sense that it becomes obvious why the media doesn’t want people to go there. They don’t want us to know the truth. They are protecting their billion dollar industry and not our children’s health. 

I have been researching vaccines for the last 6 years and I have compiled a list of my favorite websites. These are the ones that provide the most scientific information about vaccine truth. They are not mainstream media controlled websites. They do not just offer opinions, but references and quotes from doctors and scientific studies. The doctors that are featured are well-known and very respected in their field, despite what the media is telling you. I will provide the website links and one or two articles from that website that I highly recommend you read. 

    1. Green Med Info 

 This alternative health website offers a plethora of information on natural health and health guides for various illnesses. It also covers vaccines and the ingredients along with many peer-reviewed studies.

Here is the vaccine research page, full of links to unreported and overlooked peer-reviewed studies on the adverse effects of vaccines. Health Guide-Vaccine Research 

 Here is a quote from the abstract of one such study:

 “Findings suggest that U.S. male neonates vaccinated with the hepatitis B vaccine prior to 1999 (from vaccination record) had a threefold higher risk for parental report of autism diagnosis compared to boys not vaccinated as neonates during that same time period. Non-white boys bore a greater risk.”

Male Newborns Vaccinated with Hep B had 3-fold Higher Risk

Here is an article from Green Med Info showing that the CDC has admitted that vaccines are linked to SIDS.

CDC’s Own Data: Vaccine infant Death Link  

2. Mercola.com 

 Dr. Mercola is a highly educated, well-respected doctor with years of experience as a licenced physician and surgeon. He has received four different prestigious awards, including the Excellence in Integrative Medicine Award. In 2009 he was named the Top Ultimate Wellness Game Changer by the Huffington Post. He is a member of six professional organizations including the Advisory Board member Nutrition Assoiciation. He has authored 8 books and written 33 articles published in medical journals. He donates a portion of his profits to twelve different non-profit organizations including the Vitamin D Council and the National Vaccine Information Center (NVIC).

Does he sound like a quack to you? I don’t think so! But that is what the media would like you to think. I’d trust his opinion and knowledge over most doctors’ opinions. 

His website covers many health topics, diseases, and natural cures. 

Here is one of his articles: Vaccines and Neurological Damage 

3. Think Twice

Think Twice is simple and easy to navigate, yet it provides lists of hundreds of peer reviewed studies. It also has articles containing information that the media won’t report, personal stories of vaccine injury, and a closer look at individual vaccines and their risks. Influenza Vaccine the cause of Guillain Barre Syndrome

A link within Think Twice takes you to Medical Veritas, a medical journal, featuring this Article: Jurisdiction for a Federal Injunction to suspend all vaccine licenses based on unreasonable health risks and causal links to chronic disease pandemics

4.  Coalition for Mercury Free Drugs (CoMeD)

The Coalition for Mercury-free Drugs (CoMeD) is a 501(C)(3) not-for-profit group, dedicated to reducing the mercury-exposure risks, for the unborn, infants, children, and adults from all mercury-containing medical products (including vaccines) they may be exposed to. The website provides studies showing the dangers of mercury exposure and the links between neurological disorders and mercury in vaccines. 

Here is one study found on CoMeD: The Truth About The Toxicity of Mercury

5. International Medical Council on Vaccination

This website features many articles and videos from doctors who are decidedly against vaccinations. In their About page it states, “The International Medical Council on Vaccination is an association of medical doctors, registered nurses and other qualified medical professionals whose purpose is to counter the messages asserted by pharmaceutical companies, the government and medical agencies that vaccines are safe, effective and harmless.  Our conclusions have been reached individually by each member of the Council, after thousands of hours of personal research, study and observation.” – See more at: http://www.vaccinationcouncil.org/about/

This chart on their website is a quick Comparison of vaccinated and unvaccinated children. Quick Compare

Here is a quote from one of the articles: 

“Whether vaccines can, and do, cause severe, irreparable damage is not up for debate. The U.S. government’s table of recognized vaccine injuries (1) includes anaphylaxis, a severe, whole-body reaction to vaccine ingredients; encephalopathy, brain damage; brachial neuritis, a degree of loss of sensation to the shoulders, arms, hands, and chest, which can be accompanied by chronic pain, lasting years; chronic arthritis; Thrombocytopenic purpura, a loss of blood platelets resulting in ‘increased tendency to bleed’, an autoimmune disorder caused by the production of antibodies against platelet antigens.” See more at:  The Greater Harm

So far these are best websites I have found with actual scientific studies and support. These alone will give you hours and hours of reading and research. 

6. Educate 4 the Injured

This website rocks! It provides clear scientific evidence in honor of the millions injured by vaccines. It has a whole page of links to scientific studies and there is another page dedicated to documents proving vaccine failures and dangers. They also have an awesome video library and great articles. This is a great place to do research.

17 Hazardous Substances in Vaccines Including Neuro-toxins, Carcinogens, and Mutagens

April 2, 2015May 3, 2015Anti-Vaccine Scientific Support Arsenal1 Comment


 

The media says they are safe. The government websites tell us they are safe. But are they? 

 If we look at each ingredient and break it down we actually find that there are dangerous toxins, mutagens (substances that can cause genetic mutation), and carcinogens in vaccines. These chemicals may or may not be dangerous in small amounts but tests to prove the accumulative affects of these toxins have never been done. With the CDC schedule of vaccines, children are getting 20 plus vaccines by the time they are 5.  Combined and accumulative these toxins can cause a myriad of health problems, including brain damage and even death. 

 Let’s look at the vaccine ingredients list from the CDC website. All the ingredients per vaccine are listed here:
 

CDC: Excipients Included in U.S. Vaccines, by Vaccine 

 It is up to you to do the research and find out the truth. You have a right to know what the government is trying to inject into our children. You may be shocked at what you find!

 


 

I’ve listed the most caustic and disgusting ingredients below. Many of these are listed on the Special Health Hazard Substance List and the CDC National Institute Of Occupational Safety and Health website.

  1. Aluminum Phosphate-chemical name: Phosphoric Acid (a corrosive acid) and Aluminum salt (a neuro- toxin)
  2. Aluminum Sulfate-chemical name: Sulfuric Acid (an extremely carcinogenic and corrosive acid that is especially dangerous when mixed with water)  and  Aluminum salt (a neuro-toxin).
  3. Formaldehyde-a carcinogen and a mutagen (an agent that causes genetic mutation and is often associated with cancer). According to the CDC it is extremely carcinogenic to humans.
  4. Detergent 
  5. Thimerosal-(Ethylmercury) Thimerosal is 49.6% Mercury, which is the second most toxic element on earth next to plutonium and is a neuro-toxin.
  6. Acetone-A clear volatile liquid used as a solvent for paints and oils and also as a chemical in plastics and manufacturing.
  7. Monosodium Glutamate (MSG)–an excitotoxin which overexcites the brain cells to the point of damage or death, causing brain damage to varying degrees.
  8. Human Serum Albumin-a human protein, but it can only be broken down when digested. When it is injected it can cause auto-immune disorders and allergies.
  9. Benzethonium Chloride-a carcinogen (can cause cancer) and a mutagen (can cause genetic mutations).
  10. Monkey Kidney Cells-monkey cells carry viruses that can cause cancer and diseases.
  11. Calf Serum-baby cow blood after the red blood cells are removed. Can be very contaminated with phage (viruses that infect bacteria).
  12. Polysorbate 80-an emulsifier and a surfactant. Can cause infertility and an increased risk for stroke and heart attack.
  13. Ethanol-Ethyl Alcohol. Can cause headaches, drowsiness, vomiting, and uncounsciousness. 
  14. Phenol–Carbolic Acid, a corrosive acid listed by the CDC as an extremely hazardous substance in which you should AVOID ALL CONTACT! Can cause cough, dizziness, headache, nausea, vomiting, unconsciousness, convulsions, coma, and DEATH! 
  15. EDTA–increases the absorption of  chemicals into the body
  16. Glutaraldehyde-a liquid chemical used as a disinfectant, biocide, hardening agent, preservative, and embalming agent. According to the CDC it can cause asthma, breathing problems, allergies, and coughing.
  17. Ammonium Sulfate– blue green powder used in chemistry. Toxic chemical and can cause drowsiness, nausea, vomiting, and difficulty breathing.
